name: Benny Gunz
description:
The LaZer™ corporation has gone mad! In their latest pitch for more money, they caused the zombie apocalypse!

Benny Gunz just so happened to be in a LaZer™ warehouse at the time, which luckily for him, was full of guns*! The only thing he can do now is destroy the most zombies before the warehouse gets blown to bits by the government - in just one minute! 

*LaZer™ corporation is not responsible for any damage done as a result of using experimental LaZer™ tech. Play at your own risk. 

Keys

WASD - Move

Left Mouse - Shoot

Credits

Programming - POBIX

Art - OwenVanTable, Golden Gold

Sound - SomebodyThePro, Golden Gold
